ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh well I m begining to think Proon is level 45+ because at level 39 he is still red to me. Naeeldar ... From: James Schuldes  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh well I'm begining to think Proon is level 45+ because at level 39 he is
still red to me.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 3:32 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING
??*


>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Broon is the named cyclops who spawns in the river north of the East karana
>wood bridge. Kill him and his brother Droon re-spawns fast - so if you do
>Broon - pull him out of the river other wise Droon will spawn right on top
>of you.
>
>Now if you don't attack Droon right away - he runs off to hide
(disappears).
>And then Broon spawns up between the HH ramp and the Beholder canyon.
>
>If you do Broon (blue) and Droon (yellow) a couple times - papa Proon will
>spawn and he's very red to me at 30.
>
>Froon and Choon are the named cyclops that you can find in West Karana.
>
>Sylly Songsynger
>Bard of the 30th song
><Spirit of the Moon>
>somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:27 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Hey this sounded
>interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Hehe, I have tried that just recently - not solo - I am too
>chicken - but
> me and my druid pal and a warrior took on Droon. We still
>run from papa
> Proon!
>
> I like the "flees in terror..." msgs but think the funnier
>one is:
>
> Broon's eyes glaze over...
> Sorry master, calming down...
>
> Hehe - Broon is a wimp now - ez for me and another to kill.
>I am too much
> of a clutz to solo him and be safe.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 30th song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
> p.s. I helped Cappenvarra - who is a few levels up from me
>take on Froon and
> Choon. He charmed them off on each other - then we melee'd
>what was left of
> the survivor. It guess he's had some limited success doing
>that solo!
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@...
>[mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:19 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Hey this
>sounded
> interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
> >
> > For me its kinda a toss up - both
>Rivervale and HH will
> have some people I
> > know so I stop and talk to and that
>considerably delays
> things! For me -
> > I'd be hard pressed to make Frep to Qey in
>under an hour
> and a half - and
> > that if I don't stop to loc corpses or
>kill Broon for fun.
>
> Heh. Did I tell you about the time I was
>running from
> Qeynos
> to Freeport after sending the previous night
>in Permafrost,
> then ended up spending the rest of the
>afternoon in EK
> playing
> around with Droon and Chain/Screech to see
>if I could solo
> him?
>
> --
> John H. Kim
